content.raw:
Some random ideas on how to make it more exciting (I make no claims on how easy or hard these are to do):

* Add porthole windows
* Add bunks/beds
* Add shelving units instead of just crates
* Scientific equipment? (microscopes, etc)
* Laptops/LCD screens on the interior (habitat monitoring?)
* Additional tables, instead of just crates
content.html:
Some random ideas on how to make it more exciting (I make no claims on how easy or hard these are to do):

  • Add porthole windows
  • Add bunks/beds
  • Add shelving units instead of just crates
  • Scientific equipment? (microscopes, etc)
  • Laptops/LCD screens on the interior (habitat monitoring?)
  • Additional tables, instead of just crates
